title: 黑基受能捡起的方块一栏 来自维基
author: green丶bastard
txt_content:
Stone, Cobblestone, Mossy Cobblestone Dirt, Grass Wood, Wooden Plank, Leaves Sand, Sandstone Ice, Snow Block Gravel All kind of Ores Sponge Glass, Glass Pane Wool Mushroom, Flower Gold Block, Iron Block, Diamond Block, Lapis Lazuli Block Brick, Stone Brick, Cracked Stone Brick, Mossy Stone Brick Fence, Fence Gate TNT Bookshelf Clay Block Crafting Table, Chest Ice Cactus Pumpkin, Jack-O-Lantern Glowstone Netherrack Soul Sand Melon Huge Mushroom Iron Bars Monster Spawner Obsidian, Bedrock

地壳居然也算
